fr.eyzox.minecraftPattern.pattern

Class MCPatternBlock2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.eyzox.minecraftPattern.pattern.MCPatternBlock2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MCPatternBlock

    public class MCPatternBlock2D
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic class to work without Forge or other dependencies representing a block in X and Z axis
    Author:
    Alexandre DUPONCHEL

        x - The X position of the block
        z - The Z position of the block
